dishes.name: Spicy Tuna Roll
dishes.description: A classic Japanese sushi roll filled with spicy tuna, cucumber, and scallions, wrapped in seaweed and rice.

dishes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
dishes.description: Tender chunks of chicken marinated in spices and grilled, served in a creamy tomato sauce.

dishes.name: Nachos
dishes.description: Crispy tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, chicken, jalapeños, sour cream, guacamole, and salsa.

dishes.name: Tiramisu
dishes.description: An Italian dessert made of coffee-soaked ladyfingers layered with mascarpone cream and cocoa powder.
